page.title: 08NOTTINGHAM-CARRIBEAN ORIGINS
page.content: My mum and dad have lived in Nottingham for some time.They used to live in{Jamaica.}I have 3 brothers and 3 sisters-3 of us were born in London and 4 of us were born in Nottingham.In our house we{talk}in{"patois".}We like to do that because it makes us{think {of Jamaica.}My mum would like to visit Jamaica again to see her family there.My brother Alex is going to Jamaica in August with my grandma.My grandma and grandad live near us.We visit them every Sunday.My{grandma} makes us a{Jamaican meal}of rice,peas and chicken.We like to get together and talk about the family and how they are getting on. On Saturday morning we all go to the {Nottingham market}in the Victoria Centre to help my mum buy meat,{yams, {green bananas, pumpkin,}and{saltfish} I like the green bananas best.
